tiers.name: Capacity I
tiers.description: Increases the number of slots in the backpack by 9

tiers.name: Auto Pickup
tiers.description: Items matching the backpack's filter will automatically go into the backpack when picked up

tiers.name: Filter Slots I
tiers.description: Adds 5 filter slots to the backpack
